DOC.brief_title: `` Electro Acupuncture Treatment Management Chemotherapy Induced Peripheral Neuropathy ''
DOC.detailed_description: A double blind prospective randomize control pilot study cross . To assess effectiveness EA improve pain function chronic chemotherapy Induced Peripheral Neuropathy ( CIPN ) 30 participant recruit 6 month post-completion chemotherapy . Fifteen participant randomize true EA group 15 sham EA group . Those participant randomize sham group cross receive true EA trial complete . Treatment consist EA sham EA 1 x per week x 6 week . Re-assessment visit occur 6 week intervention 2 month post trial . Each assessment visit quantifies sensory experience CIPN moment time use Quantitative Sensory Testing ( QST ) include ; thermal detection thermal pain threshold , light touch detection use nylon monofilament hair ( Semmes Weinstein Monofilaments ( SWMF ) ) , static 2-point discrimination , pressure algometry vibration threshold . Patient report outcome measure include Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) , Lower extremity functional score ( LEFS ) , Self report Leeds Assessment Neuropathic sign symptom ( S-LANSS ) pain questionaire also use .
